comment: /**  * Specify if this factory supports the specified {@link Method}.  * @param method an {@link EventListener} annotated method  * @return {@code true} if this factory supports the specified method  */
code: /**  * Specify if this factory supports the specified {@link Method}.  * @param method an {@link EventListener} annotated method  * @return {@code true} if this factory supports the specified method  */ boolean supportsMethod(Method method).

comment: /**  * Create an {@link ApplicationListener} for the specified method.  * @param beanName the name of the bean  * @param type the target type of the instance  * @param method the {@link EventListener} annotated method  * @return an application listener, suitable to invoke the specified method  */
code: /**  * Create an {@link ApplicationListener} for the specified method.  * @param beanName the name of the bean  * @param type the target type of the instance  * @param method the {@link EventListener} annotated method  * @return an application listener, suitable to invoke the specified method  */ ApplicationListener<?> createApplicationListener(String beanName, Class<?> type, Method method).
